tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_costs (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  origin_city VARCHAR(50),
  destination_city VARCHAR(50),
  distance FLOAT,
  cost_per_km DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_costs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    distance DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    cost_per_mile DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    total_cost DECIMAL NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    travel_time INTEGER NOT NULL,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  origin_city VARCHAR(50),
  destination_city VARCHAR(50),
  distance DECIMAL,
  cost_per_mile DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  total_cost DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES transportation_routes(route_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  origin_location VARCHAR(50),
  destination_location VARCHAR(50),
  distance FLOAT,
  cost_per_mile FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  assignment_date DATE
);
